casebody.data:
SUCCESSION OF Mary Lou THRASHER No. 2018-C-774 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 28, 2018 WRIT OF CERTIORARI TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, THIRD CIRCUIT, PARISH OF RAPIDES Writ denied. WEIMER, J., would grant.

HUGHES, J., dissents and assigns reasons.

Accepting demonstrably wrong expert opinion over an authentic act sworn to by a Louisiana attorney and two witnesses is a dereliction of duty by the courts.
